title: How to Pay Using Amazon Pay Balance

steps.title: Go to the website of the store you wish to shop from.
steps.content: Go to the website of the store you wish to shop from. Amazon partners with several brands to use Amazon Pay. Visit https://pay.amazon.com/using-amazon-pay to see the stores that are eligible for paying with Amazon Pay. They are listed under "Browse featured stores".

steps.title: Shop as your normally would.
steps.content: Shop as your normally would. Browse or search for items and add ones that you like to your cart.

steps.title: Go to your cart.
steps.content: Go to your cart. The cart can usually be found at the top of the window. Or, you can click View Cart after adding an item to your cart.

steps.title: Click Checkout.
steps.content: Click Checkout . This is usually at the bottom or on the side of your cart.

steps.title: Select Amazon Pay as your checkout method.
steps.content: Select Amazon Pay as your checkout method. This will usually be a button listed with other checkout options, and will have the Amazon logo.

steps.title: Log in to your Amazon account.
steps.content: Log in to your Amazon account. Enter your email and password and click Sign in using our secure server . If you have already signed in to your Amazon account recently, you may not see this login screen. Instead, you just need to click the button that says Continue as (your name) to automatically sign in with that account.

steps.title: Continue your order.
steps.content: Continue your order. Select a shipping address from the ones saved on your Amazon account, and choose a shipping method.

steps.title: Select your Amazon balance as your payment method.
steps.content: Select your Amazon balance as your payment method. On the payment page, choose your balance from the list of accepted payment methods associated with your Amazon account.

steps.title: Complete the transaction.
steps.content: Complete the transaction. This is usually a button like Check Out , or Complete Order .
